Detection of tools being downloaded from.Data: Zeek http.log, Zeek file.log, Windows Event ID 4688
Detection of tools being downloaded from.Action: Monitor Zeek http.log and file.log for file downloads. Analyze download sources (IPs, domains) and compare against threat intelligence feeds or reputation lists of known adversary infrastructure or suspicious hosting providers. Correlate with Windows Event ID 4688 to identify processes initiating downloads. Use frequency analysis on download sources to identify rare or unique download origins.

Network traffic patterns or connections.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and dns.log for connections and DNS queries to external IPs/domains. Compare against threat intelligence feeds of known adversary infrastructure. Identify connections to domains hosted on suspicious cloud infrastructure or services frequently abused for staging (e.g., certain free hosting, specific PaaS providers). Use correlation analysis to link connections to suspicious destinations with other internal activity.
